resources.string: Are you sure you want \nto submit the Quiz?

● Rules for MCQ 
		• First column should be of questions
		• Second column should be the options
		• Third column should be the answer
		• Fourth column should be the explanation

● Rules for True and False 
		• First column should be of questions
		• Second column should be the answer
		• Third column should be the explanation

string.name: quest1
string.small: What is the Nmber of primitive datatypes?
